dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4656 IH: Fishing and Small Vessel Relief Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Herrera Beutler (for herself and Mr. Kilmer) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To extend a prohibition relating to permits for discharges incidental to the normal operation of certain vessels.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Fishing and Small Vessel Relief Act.

section.header: Discharges incidental to normal operation of vessels
section.text: Section 2(a) of Public Law 110â€“299 (33 U.S.C. 1342 note) is amended by striking December 18, 2017 and inserting December 18, 2020.
